name: arx-map-restored-outpost-and-tavern
description: An alternative version of the Outpost/Tavern level of Arx Fatalis aiming to restore how it looked during the game's development

scripts.dev: npm run generate && npm run rungame
scripts.dev:noclip: npm run generate && npm run rungame:noclip
scripts.prod: export mode="production" && npm run generate && npm run rungame
scripts.release:normal: export outputDir="./output" && export mode="production" && npm run generate

author: Lajos Mészáros <m_lajos@hotmail.com>
